title: #195 - Ralph Garman & ME
description: Actor, Comedian, Podcaster, & Radio Host Ralph Garman hangs out in the Mancave to talk about his unique path through Hollywood, Nerd Culture, Comic Con before it was hip, his Podcast with Kevin Smith, & what TV series we would like to bring back and star in!
